code: @Override public int read() throws IOException {     int c = super.read().     if (c > 0 && recording) {         buf.write(c).     }     return c. }

@Override public int read(char[] cbuf, int off, int len) throws IOException {     int n = super.read(cbuf, off, len).     if (n > 0 && recording) {         buf.write(cbuf, off, n).     }     return n. }
public String getText(int pos) {     recording = false.     String t = new String(buf.getCharArray(), 0, pos).     buf.trim(pos, 0).     return t. }
public char[] getChars(int pos) {     recording = false.     char[] b = buf.toCharArray(pos).     buf.trim(pos, 0).     return b. }
public void trim(int head, int tail) {     System.arraycopy(buf, head, buf, 0, count - head - tail).     count -= head + tail. }
public char[] toCharArray(int len) {     char[] b = new char[len].     System.arraycopy(buf, 0, b, 0, len).     return b. }
